name: Cricket Champs: Super Over - Epic T2 World Championship 2014
name_original: Cricket Champs: Super Over - Epic T2 World Championship 2014
description:
Cricket Fever? ** The Most Challenging Cricket Game of this season Cricket WorldCup 2014**
It’s all about shot selection and timing but only a Legend can hit a six every ball. Choose your team and face the world’s best bowlers.
** Four exciting modes of play in Cricket WorldCup 2014 **
1.Super Over
2.World Championship ­ 5 Overs Match up 3.Score maximum runs with 3 or 5 Wickets 4.Score maximum runs in 5 or 10 or 20 Overs
** Super Over **
Consists of one over in each match. You will be given a target that has to be chased down in one over. A successful completion will allow you to unlock the next match. Get all stars to unlock & challenge the best ALL STAR team in the world.
** World Championship ­ 5 Overs Match­up **
Consists of 5 overs in each match. You will be given a target that has to be chased down in 5 overs. A successful completion will allow you to unlock the next match. Get all stars to unlock & challenge the best ALL STAR team in the world.
Cricket WorldCup 2014
** Score maximum runs with 3 or 5 Wickets **
Score maximum runs with 3 or 5 wickets in hand and top the leader board in the game center.
** Score maximum runs in 5 or 10 or 20 Overs **
Score maximum runs with 5 or 10 or 20 Overs and top the leader board in the game center.
Enjoy this best t20 cricket style in Cricket WorldCup 2014. score as much as you can. 2014 Cricket fever is ON

Play Cricket WorldCup 2014 now!!!
